modName: Toasted Dragonplate - Hot and Smoky Recolor
summary: An orange and black, lightly toasted recolor of the Dragonplate armor.
descriptionHtml:
A recolor of http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=305

I tried the link above, and plenty of other Dragonplate textures, and nothing really felt right to me. So I tried my hand at recoloring, and revamped the harsh reds and blacks of Dragonbone Armor in Fire into a deliciously cooled-off, dry toasted bone look.

Enjoy the forge-smoked bone look this retexture gives you, and let me know what you think.

If you like this, check out my other retexture:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7665
author: wetsail
